action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Allie, 

Great news, we have completed the most recent round of updates. Can I please ask you to review these and let us know of any further changes?

Hi @chris following updates completed, please check Thanks

✅ 1. Can we fully width align the top text on the form page instead of center align? I couldn't see that functionality in the back end when I tried but I'm sure you can do that!
✅ 2. Is there any way to not have the contact us form sitting below the external imaging request form just for that specific page? I just feel like it looks funny with both forms on the one page!
link - https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests/form/

✅ 3. I'm not sure if we mentioned but on the front home page, one of the scrolling carousel images promotes external imaging as well. I tried to change this to one button and updated the text however it's now a fat button and wondering if it can extend longer horizontally under the main text if possible? Let me know if what I said makes sense. Ideally that text should match the text on the external imaging page and read " MRI / CT / Ultrasound / Echocardiogram "
link - https://vsos.com.au/

Time: +10mins
hi @jaime please see below for updates on this ticket. Please let me know if you require clarification.

Yes please! For point 3, please turn the two buttons to one longer horizontal button that directs to https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests/form/ !!

Cheers!

Allie Loomis​



Veterinary
Specialists of Sydney

Relationship Coordinator

02 8376 8767

Allie.Loomis@vsos.com.au

vsos.com.au









106 Parraweena Rd, Miranda NSW 2228

Hi Allie, 

Of course they are possible and we'll get started ASAP. Some notes on each request below. 

1. Yes, we can indeed. 

2. Yes, we can have the contact us form removed from just this page: https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests/form/

3. Yes. Is it ok for us to change the buttons in your screen shot to both direct to the new form https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests/form/ ? At present, the mobile buttons are being sent to Jotforms. This will allow us to turn 2 buttons into one and use a single form.

Hi Chris!

Looking really good b thanks for those tweaks!

A couple tiny ones from me if possible!
1. Can we fully width align the top text on the form page instead of center align? I couldn't see that functionality in the back end when I tried but I'm sure you can do that!
2. Is there any way to not have the contact us form sitting below the external imaging request form just for that specific page? I just feel like it looks funny with both forms on the one page!
3. I'm not sure if we mentioned but on the front home page, one of the scrolling carousel images promotes external imaging as well. I tried to change this to one button and updated the text however it's now a fat button and wondering if it can extend longer horizontally under the main text if possible? Let me know if what I said makes sense. Ideally that text should match the text on the external imaging page and read " MRI / CT / Ultrasound / Echocardiogram "



Thanks so much!!

Allie Loomis

Allie Loomis​



Veterinary
Specialists of Sydney

Relationship Coordinator

02 8376 8767

Allie.Loomis@vsos.com.au

vsos.com.au









106 Parraweena Rd, Miranda NSW 2228

Hi Natalie, 

I hope all is well. Here is a quick update on the progress of your request: https://www.loom.com/share/dfb0d20efa354269b4c46a65229e77a3

The direct link to the form is: https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests/form/

As mentioned in the video, please let us know what you like and what you'd like to see tweaked!
@jaime Thanks Jaime, looking great, I will share with CX and seek feedback.

Hi @chris updates completed

✅ 1. https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests
✅ Add button with hover to make "MRI / CT / Ultrasound / Echocardiogram Online Form" more visible.

✅ 2. For https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests/form/ can we please follow styling on https://vsos.com.au/contact-us/

Please check and let me know if we have any changes. thanks

Time: +20mins @ricaV2

Hi @jaime thanks. 
Here is my suggestion:
1. https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests
Add button with hover to make "MRI / CT / Ultrasound / Echocardiogram Online Form" more visible. 
2. For https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests/form/ can we please follow styling on https://vsos.com.au/contact-us/
Once complete, please let me know, thanks!

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi @chris updates completed

✅ Add "External Imaging Requests"
✅ Also on the homepage banner, I changed the "advanced treatment centre" background image to one with our branding/logo but it hasn't been updated on the live homepage.

would you mind checking the banner slider to confirm if the client's updates have been applied? I believe they made some changes in the Smart Slider, so it would be great if you could verify that everything is up to date. Thank you!

Time: +15mins @ricaV2
@jaime please let me know if you would like to discuss the below request.

Sorry, a couple more things!



Also add this link to the footer: https://vsos.com.au/external-imaging-requests/ of the website for easy access for vets. Name the link "External Imaging Requests"



Also on the homepage banner, I changed the "advanced treatment centre" background image to one with our branding/logo but it hasn't been updated on the live homepage. Could you look into this for us?





Natalie Alderton​

Maybe with a button?

Thank you in advance!
